name: Dune Racers
description:
Ok.. So you've ended up here.. Either you're a friend of mine or a vw-nerd. 

see controls in Installation instructions

So when you've launched the game. you can select a car of 3 types. 

  • cute round car
  • meat-loaf car
  • sporty sport car

Select a car with up/down buttons and change color left/right.

Start the game.

Now you have to find a matching caravan for your car. Now.. Done.. that's it... Drive like hell. Bump opponents or take a bath in the ocean. 

hey.. this is version 0.1.. what did you expect?

ps. Disclaimer: The car names are fiction and not really car names.  #dont-want-to-be-sued
